We did have to go get our own toilet paper, paper towels, coffee filters and bath soap and shampoo. I don't know if that was an oversight on the housekeeping, but it wasn't a deal breaker.
Our family of four enjoyed a 5 night stay. The beds were comfortable, and linens in good shape. Our oldest son is a chef, and he prepared a nice meal one night in the kitchen, and he had everything he needed.
We highly recommend this property!

The artwork and amenities set the tone for relaxation and entertainment, and Vicksburg itself has surprising entertainment value. Don't miss Hwy 61 Cafe for coffee (and the fun, colorful, ecclectic artist's loft upstairs), Anchuca for an amazing weekend brunch, and Ten South for sunset cocktails with a view. review_text: I do not know how to describe the listing other than it was exactly like the photos! This is definitely the most unique and stylish location I have ever stayed in from Airbnb and one of the most spectacular ever. The location (downtown Vicksburg) could not be better. I was able to park my car on the street and then just walk to shops, restaurants and many sightseeing venues. Communication before hand was exceptional. I knew exactly who would meet us at the gallery and exactly when. The young man who met us was prompt, helpful (helped take our luggage upstairs) and knew a lot about the area. He gave us all the particulars on the loft and gave us all the information Chris had left in the loft. The loft is well marked - wifi, private areas, ac, alarm system.....There is a full kitchen and as a bonus The Miss Mississippi Pagent parade was Monday night. We bought frozen catered food from down the street and prepared it in the kitchen. We ate in and watched the parade from the windows! We were not able to utilize the balcony space as it was too hot. However, a trip in the fall or spring might be necessary! The loft was exactly as promised - I cannot stress that enough. Amenities are plentiful, wifi, cable, full bath with an awesome shower and for this time of the year a phenomanal ac! This loft is a must rental for anyone visiting Vicksburg!
